title: Frank AlpenCoin

created_time: May 16, 2022, 07:29:24 PMLast edit: May 19, 2022, 11:35:09 AM by Frank AlpenCoin
content: AUCTION for the low serials of the "Alpen Coin 500,000 Satoshi Silver Plated Bar"     2022 Silver Plated BarDenomination: 0.005 BTC or 500,000 satsMaterial: Silver Plated AlloyDimensions: 40 x 80 mmThickness: 6 mmWeight: 150 gThis is for Serials: D001, D002, D003, D004, D005, D006, D007, D008, D009, D010.Starting time: Now!Ends: Wednesday night, 18th of May, at 23:00:00 according to Geneva (Switzerland) timezone (CET).Starting bid per set: 0.005 BTC.Min bid increments: 0.0001BTC.Sniping: Any bid made in the last 10 minutes of the auction will extend the auction by 10 minutes from the last placed bid until no new bids are made.Shipping: worldwide 25 USD / EU 22 USD. Winner will be liable for any VAT/Import taxes.Bidding format: #001 @ 0.001BTC, #007 @ 0.0011BTC or ALL @ +0.0001BTC for example.Payment address in DM.                                                                                                                                           TO BTCID, OR NOT TO BTCID
